divs: sighting detailsjune 24, 2008: my girlfriend called me outside to look at something in the night sky. she usually busts my balls about seeing ufos cause i'm basically a fanatic and am constantly looking, but anyway, i go outside and sure enough i saw something. at first, i thought it was just a helicopter going to one of the local hospitals in the area cause at night, they tend to fly by with red and white lights. however, this was no helicopter for it made no sound. i continued to watch this ufo and its red and white lights. it either remained stationary or moved very slowly. then, all of a sudden, another one of these red and white lighted objects appeared. i could not make out the size or shape of them, but it was basically in a horizontal pattern of red, white, red. before i knew it, there were four of these objects, some of which were moving around almost doings laps, some of which did not. i went walking around to get a better view and then i saw one very huge white lighted object almost coming toward me getting brighter and brighter before it just disappeared. when this object disappeared, the red and white ones did so too. for my first ufo sighting, it was quite incredible. june 25, 2008: i figured maybe what i saw last night could turn out to be like a "scranton lights" kind of thing the next, so i went outside around 10:00pm and sure enough, i saw saw something again...only this time, i saw just one red and white lighted object over by where the scranton\wilkes-barre international airport is. it remained stationary for a while. then, the freakiest part of it all, i saw a plane heading in the airport\ufo's direction and thought to myself, this could be very interesting. i wish i could have been that pilot. anyway, as the plane was approaching the airport\ufo, what looked like a shooting star, passed almost through the plane out of nowhere. then, the ufo over the airport disappeared and another red and white light object flew over my house only to disappear in the distance. was that shooting star thing a shooting star or was it ufo related? i really think it was the latter. it was insane to see.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Scranton
There were no other sightings in Scranton on or around June 24th 2008
